column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////This is one of my favorite restaurants in Houston. They have several locations
column2: but the one on Westheimer is the best! The desserts are gorgeous
column3: but they are OK.  I rather have savory than sweet!  I ordered the Tomato Basil Soup with a Grilled Cheese Sandwich and Poutine. Poutine is a Canadian dish with fries
